name: Lucky Homes
address: Đường 20T Phong Nha - xã Sơn Trạch - huyện Bố Trạch- tỉnh Quảng Bình, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Lucky Homes có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Phong Nha. Ngoài dịch vụ phòng, chỗ nghỉ này còn có nhà hàng để phục vụ du khách. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Các phòng đều có điều hòa, ngoài ra một số phòng tại khách sạn có ban công.

Lucky Homes có phục vụ bữa sáng kiểu Á mỗi buổi sáng.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Lucky Homes 39 km.

review.comment_positive: Die beste Unterkunft, die ich in Vietnam bisher hatte! Die Besitzerin + Mitarbeiter sind sehr nett, zuvorkommend und helfen, wo sie nur können. Sie haben mich auch um 3 Uhr nachts vom Bus abgeholt und mir am Abreisetag in der Früh extra Frühstück vorbereitet. Darüber hinaus kann man Touren etc. über die Unterkunft buchen und sie geben einem jede Menge Tipps. Die Unterkunft und Zimmer sind generell schön, WiFi funktioniert gut und die Lage ist gut. Ich komme gerne wieder 😊

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The homestay is well located, not too far from town. We ate in town one night and at homestay other night, and food at homestay was pretty good. The road and town have little traffic so very reasonable to bike around.
Room is spacious, clean, nice hot shower, and good Wifi.
The owners are very accommodating, helping to arrange transport for us and info on tours.
this is a very good value place.
review.comment_negative: There is no heating in room, AC only. Not an issue in warmer months but room is slightly chilly this time of year.

review.rating: Attractive, good value for money and relaxing small riverside hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The location by the river is splendid, but as it was rainy or overcast for most of our time we could not appreciate that or the nice large pool properly. The room was large with a huge bathroom. The owners were friendly and responsive and their driver took us to Dong Hoi rail station for a good price at the end. They were expecting a new litter of puppies any day, but unfortunately this had not happened by the time we left!
review.comment_negative: Driver rates within the Phong Nha area are a little high as there are no taxis.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Ich war zwei Nächte im Lucky Homes und hatte eine großartige Zeit. Alle Mitarbeiter sind unglaublich freundlich und Linh sorgt dafür, dass man sich immer rundum wohl fühlt. Der Service ist wirklich überragend. Linh hat sich um alles gekümmert: ich kam morgens um 4 Uhr in Phong Nha an und wurde kostenlos vom Bus abgeholt. Da die Unterkunft ausgebucht war, konnte ich noch ein paar Stunden in einem Bett neben der Rezeption schlafen. Linh organisierte eine Tourbuchung für mich und ich konnte kostenlos ein Fahrrad ausleihen, um die Gegend zu erkunden. Am dritten Tag wollte ich gerne in den botanischen Garten, traute mich jedoch nicht alleine Motorroller zu fahren, deshalb organisierte Linh mir einen Fahrer. Anschließend durfte ich, obwohl ich schon ausgecheckt hatte, den Tag in der Unterkunft verbringen und wurde abends wieder zum Bus gebracht. Wirklich super toller Service, danke!

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non

Spacious rooms and ensuites. Fantastic to have a good sized pool to relax in. Great location along the river and very close to a number of good restaurants. Lucky Homes also do great meals, you don’t need to go anywhere if you don’t want to!
A family run operation ably assisted by English speaking Binh who organises anything and everything for you. Everyone was very welcoming and helpful. We stayed for a week so it was sad to say goodbye!

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: Очень милый небольшой семейный отель. Очень тихо, чисто, хороший бассейн. Комнаты большие, чистые,  есть чайник, кондиционер и вентилятор в комнате. Горячая вода без нареканий.  Завтрак не буфетный, а по заказу (мы брали омлет, булочки и бананы). Можно позавтракать с видом на реку. Находится не в центре посёлка, но на главной улице, так что можно добраться в любую пещеру. Также в отеле можно заказать экскурсии в пещеры -- и обычные пешеходные, и экстрим. Пещеры потрясающие!   Всё прошло отлично, вполне рекомендую.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: De homestay ligt op een gunstige ligging vlakbij restaurants e.d. en direct aan de rivier. Kamer was netjes en schoon en de eigenaresse en familie waren erg vriendelijk. Ik werd gratis opgehaald 's nachts vanaf het busstation en weer weggebracht voor mijn volgende nachtbus. Verder kon ik kosteloos gebruik maken van een fiets tijdens mijn verblijf. Voor mijn verblijf werd er al contact gelegd via WhatsApp en heeft ze voor mij een excursie geboekt en de nachtbus naar volgende plaats.
review.comment_negative: Openbare toilet was niet echt schoon en badkamer was wat gedateerd en lekte boven het toilet. Was niet heel erg, maar dat waren de enige minpuntjes.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: This homestay was so nice. It was very clean and modern. The rooms were spacious and the beds were comfortable. We had a mountain view room which had a table and chairs on the terrace so we could see the mountains. The pool was clean and breakfast overlooking the river each morning was great.  The location is just a short 15-20 minute into the centre of town and was really peaceful.
review.comment_negative: We couldn't get hot water from our shower. Not a big problem though.

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Sauberes, grosszügiges Zimmer, bequeme Matratze, gute Dusche mit Abgrenzung zum restlichen Badezimmer, Schrank für Kleiderablage, Wasserkocher, Badetücher, Zahnbürste, Shampoo, Dusch, sauberer Pool. Die gesamte Familie und das Personal war sehr zuvorkommend, freundlich und ich würde zu 100% wieder dieses Hotel wählen. Das zugehörige Restaurant wo es auch das Frühstück gibt, war auch sehr gut. Menüs sind lecker und wurden immer frisch zubereitet. Portionen waren gross und der Preis günstig. Ich wurde sogar vom Dorfzentrum (Bus Drop-off) abgeholt und auch wieder zu meinem Bus hingefahren. Ich wurde richtig verwöhnt mit Kleinigkeiten, die ich sehr schätzte und bin den Gastgebern dankbar für den schönen Aufenthalt in Phong Nha.

review.rating: Ideale per famiglie per visitare il parco naturale!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Posto tranquillo a pochi minuti dal centro del paese! Camera e bagno grandissimi! Letti comodi e tutto pulito! Ottimo il ristorante e bellissimi il giardino e la piscina! Chiedete al proprietario per organizzare la vostra escursione nelle grotte o nella foresta, ce ne sono per tutti i gusti e le capacità, a ottimi prezzi! Noi gli abbiamo chiesto, quando siamo partiti per Dan Ang, di organizzarci un trasferimento con sosta alla zona demilitarizzata(DMZ) e lui ha voluto vedere bene la nostra guida per organizzare al meglio il tutto con un trasporto privato. È andato tutto benissimo e con un prezzo veramente onesto!
Bellissima la colazione in riva al fiume, sotto gli alberi. Grazie!  Abbiamo viaggiato in coppia con un figlio di 13 anni. Lo consiglio veramente, anche se avete bimbi più piccoli! 

Quiet place just a few minutes from the village centre! Very large room and bathroom! Comfortable beds and everything clean! Great restaurant and beautiful garden and pool! Ask the owner to organise your excursion to the caves or the forest, there is something for all tastes and abilities, at great prices! We asked him, when we left for Dan Ang, to organise a transfer with a stop at the demilitarised zone (DMZ) and he wanted to see our guide so that we could make the best arrangements with private transport. Everything went very well and for a very honest price!
Beautiful breakfast by the river, under the trees. Thank you!  We travelled as a couple with a 13-year-old son. I really recommend it, even if you have younger children!

La habitación era muy grande y las camas eran muy cómodas. También tenia un baño enorme. 
Nos quedamos en este sitio sobre todo para ir a las curvas y hacer actividades alrededor!

review.rating: kein Schlaf durch Holzwürmer im Bett
review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: Gutes Schwimmbecken zum braun braten.
review.comment_negative:
Holzwürmer im Bett. Unsere Betten hatten Holzwürmer. Die ganze Nacht wurde musste man sich mit knabber Geräusche von Holzwürmer abfinden. Durch die Knabber Geräusche konnte meine Frau und Ich nicht richtig Schlafen.
Nach 3 mal Beschwerde bei Vermieter wurden 3 erfolglose bekämpfungs Versuche mit Chemie ausgeführt.
Das Essen ist okay aber viel zu teuer. Es halten sich wegen dem Schwimmbecken viele Deutsche und Europa Leute im Hotel auf. Das Schwimmbecken scheint gut zu sein. Im Badezimmer stinkt es nach Abwasser aus dem Waschbecken. Das Waschbecken ist falsch instaliert und es fehlt der Abwassertraps unter dem Waschbecken-Knie unten. 
Es ist traurig das Booking.com keine Leute in die Hotels sendet um den schlechten Zustand zu prüfen- Booking.com benutzt
seine Gäste um kostenlos Qualitätsmanagement zu bekommen. Früher gab es bei den Reiseveranstalter Qualitätsmanagement.

Airport transfers from Dong Hoi , motorbike rental, laundry service and free bicycle use are easy to arrange and very convenient. The restaurant is open all day and has great food, I recommend the chicken with chill and lemongrass. Great place to stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We kwamen midden in de nacht (03:00) aan en ze bleven wakker om ons binnen te laten en ons alvast een kamer te geven. Super lief. De kamers zijn lekker ruim en de badkamers groot, modern en met een fijne douche! Een meid die er werkt spreekt Engels en kan helpen bij alles. De eigenaar is een leuke man die mijn ouders heeft uitgenodigd om samen met zijn vrienden een trip te gaan maken toen wij aan het hiken waren. Het zwembad was fijn en men kan heerlijk rustig aan de rivier zitten. Iets verder af van het centrum maar dit vonden wij juist fijn. Een scooter daar gehuurd en zo hebben we een dag de hele omgeving verkend.

We enjoyed the peaceful location but appreciated being able to walk to the town and boat station. I would definitely book again for our next stay in the area.

review.comment_positive: End to end pleasure. We stayed 3 nights, and took it slow. The family are super nice and attentive, and make you feel at home. Fantastic location close to the main caves as well as the village center. They were proactive in seeking to support - which makes us feel taken care of. Really great experience

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi

Spacious room and enormous bathroom! Fridge was also excellent which has not veen the case in other hotels weve stayed in. Lastly, the family dog had puppies just before we arrived and they were super cute!
review.comment_negative: Location was lovely for the river and mountain views, but was a good 10 minute walk to the nearest mini market. Not a huge problem but something to bear in mind!

review.rating: Great place to stay with lovely owners!

The hosts were the best: I had many problems to arrive and Phong nha and Xiem helped me all the way, even staying awake at around 4 am. So for me this was the best stay possible. I recommend everyone to come here

Very kind and helpful during our stay.

review.comment_positive: Very quiet this time of year, comfortable beds, good breakfast and could organize all tours and buses for us, very helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Hotel familiar limpio y cómodo. Nos dejaron entrar en la habitación a primerísima hora de la mañana ya que llegamos en autobús cuando estaba amaneciendo. Muy fácil poder contratar con ellos los diferentes tour que hacer por la zona, así como el transporte hacia otras ciudades.
review.comment_negative: El último día que estuvimos teníamos que coger el bus en una parada que estaba a algo más de 1,5 km y tuvimos que contratar un conductor para que nos acercara. Hubiera sido un detalle que nos acercaran ellos teniendo en cuenta que tanto los tour como los transportes e incluso la colada lo contratamos con ellos y pagamos bastante por todo. Este detalle si lo tuvieron en otros hoteles en Vietnam y en distancias más largas

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Very friendly hosts who did their best to make our trip memorable. We booked two tours through the hotel. Awesome experience!! Their restaurant also serves delicious food.
review.comment_negative: None!

review.rating: Great location to stay while exploring Phong Nha National Park and their amazing caves!
review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: The location was great!  Far enough away from the noise but yet close enough to walk into town.  The older couple were so pleasant and helpful and took care of all our needs.  we were greeted with a smile every day!  The place was thoroughly cleaned each day with fresh linens and bath towels, they emptied the garbage and supplied us with more water.  The breakfast was very good and the dinners were great!  They also provided bicycles for free  and scooters for a minimal cost for us to use which was great!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The room was very clean. The staff was very nice. Linh helped us to book a nice cave tour. She was very helpful and we could text her every time we had a question. We arrived late that day and we didn’t had dinner yet. The driver brought us to town and picked us up for free. During our cave tour we could leave our bags at the home stay and when we got back we could take a shower and have some dinner before we took the night bus. The food was really nice!

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: Heerlijk zwembad en erg vriendelijk personeel. Lekker ontbijt aan de rivier

review.comment_positive: Großes Zimmer, sauberer Pool und super Lage am Fluss! Bei Buchung über die Unterkunft holt der Bus einen an der Unterkunft ab. Super. Preis ähnlich wie online. Fahrrad und Scooterverleih vorhanden

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: Highly Recommended!  Great and nice family hotel!  Spacious and clean rooms.  Nicely sized bathrooms too.  A great garden with pool and a small restaurant overlooking the water.
review.comment_negative: none

review.comment_positive: Habitaciones sencillas y limpias. El personal fue muy amable y la ubicación excelente. Llegamos por la noche y nos dieron de cenar.

The Staff were so super helpful and kind, helped organising things, chatted to us and even packed us breakfast on the go early in the morning on our last day. 

Having a pool is such a treat too, to relax after a big day. 

There were bikes to use free of charge which was such a treat!

Location is about 15 min walk to town, lots of restaurant choices along the way but not as busy as being right in town.
review.comment_negative:

Lounging areas around pool could have been more comfortable,  but for the price point, no complaints.

review.comment_positive:
If I could give this place 100 stars I would! we have been travelling for months and this has been by far the best place we have stayed! In terms of value for money, the family , the facilities, everything! They could not do enough for us. They gave us somewhere to sleep when our sleeper bus arrived at 4am ! over two hours early! and then let us check into our room early! They even dropped us to the bus station with our bags when we were leaving! 
they also offer free bicycles to explore the area.  100% recommend!:)

review.comment_positive: Collected by staff from bus station after late bus, great comms with host over this, they booked a day cave tour for us before we had arrived, lovely clean rooms, quiet location, free bikes to cycle into town, lovely pool, host sorted taxi and bag storage in dong hoi which went smoothly. Good breakfasts and beers with riverside view! Overall a top place to stay with siem as a lovely helpful host.

review.comment_positive:
Cuba was great throughout our stay, as were the rest of the staff. We organised trips through them and also rented a scooter without any problems. 

There were bikes to use for free which made getting into town very easy. 

The room was a good size with a comfortable bed.

The pool was a good size and it was nice to cool off in. 

There's a restaurant on site which a decent range of options, good portion sizes and reasonably priced. 

They also arranged transfers for us and did our laundry at a reasonable price.
review.comment_negative: The aircon wasn't great and struggled to cool the room down. The bathroom had an unpleasant smell at times. Overall for the money this was a great place to stay in Phong Nha.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_negative: Phòng Family nhưng bình nước nóng phòng tắm dung tích nhỏ. Bình nướng nóng chỉ đủ tắm 1 người là hết nước nóng trong khi phòng Family thường ở 3-4 người

review.rating: Très agréable séjour, les caves sont vraiment grandioses

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Lovely breakfast each morning which we ate looking at the river and mountains. Great location. Bikes can be used for free to see the local area. For a small fee they will also wash your clothes. Lots of nice restaurants nearby to try. Views from this hotel are amazing. They also helped us book cave tours and a car to our next destination.
review.comment_negative: Bikes were usable but need fixing up. Tyres needed to be pumped up and breaks were really squeaky and loud.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay in Lucky Homes. Bihn was so nice and helpful. We booked a kayak tour through him which was so much fun and really made our Vietnam trip. He also organised a transfer from the train station and also a bus to our next stop for us. The property is lovely. The bedroom was comfortable and the bathroom was absolutely massive. The pool was great to use to escape the hot sun. Breakfast was lovely each morning and the served lunch and dinner too which was handy if you didn’t want to venture out for food. The have a few tables overlooking the river so it was lovely to sit and have a beer there in the evening and take in the amazing views.

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive:
Large spacious bedroom and bathroom
Great food. Lovely hosts

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: This place is family run, the lady spoke good English, the family are lovely the lady booked our tour to the caves which were amazing. The bed was comfortable good night sleep, the breakfast omelette was fantastic, really welcoming really nice stay, great neighborhood. Breakfast by the river is stunning.
review.comment_negative: Perfect stay, we hope to return back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
LOVED OUR STAY HERE! 
The location is one of the best in Phong Nha, gorgeous view of the river to wake up to. Free Bicycles made it quick and easy to ride through town. The rooms were massive! The staff organised transfer to and from the train station, helped us to book a great cave tour and did our laundry within record time. The pool was cold during February so we didn’t swim but it looked great. Would 100% recommend and would stay again.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast wasn’t the best but it wasn’t included so we felt no pressure to eat there. Instead head a few doors down to the Villas Restaurant for some of the best food in Phong Nha.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive:
Large room, large bathroom, both clean.
Good location. Staff were friendly and helpfull.
Dog welcoming me everytime I returned from
a tour :-)

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: This is a beautiful place run by really lovely people, and is outstanding value for money. I will definitely stay here again if I come back to Phong Nga.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Wir wurden super freundlich von allen in Empfang genommen und sogar am Bus abgeholt beziehungsweise wieder dorthin zurück gebracht. Auch die Buchung einer Tour hat bereits vor Anreise prima funktioniert. Die Zimmer sind eher funktional, aber extrem sauber 👍 Die Lage, direkt am Fluss, war super schön. Obwohl wir am Abend abgereist sind, durften wir trotzdem am Nachmittag noch den Pool nutzen und auch noch mal duschen.
review.comment_negative: Das Frühstück war super lecker, aber die Auswahl war nicht so groß.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: This homestay is really lovely, just opposite the rivers and mountains, but still close to everything. The swimming pool is a plus, they also have bikes to use freely. More importantly the owners, especially Bing went above and beyond to make our stay the best and easiest as possible! Thank you

review.rating: Außerordentlich zuvorkommendes Personal in schönem Homestay
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Wir waren für eine Nacht hier und sind mit dem
Nachtbus um 04:30 Uhr angekommen. Das Personal bietet einen kostenfreien Abholservice mit Rollern an, auch um diese Uhrzeit. Unser Zimmer war um die Uhrzeit noch belegt, aber wir konnten auf einem vorbereiteten Bett mit Kissen und Decke im Rezeptionsbereich schlafen.
Die Anlage ist sehr gepflegt und sehr schön. Sowohl das Zimmer als auch das Badezimmer sind groß und sehr sauber. Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich. Wir konnten uns kostenlos Räder ausleihen und einen Roller mieten (die eigenen Roller der Unterkunft waren zu dem Zeitpunkt alle vermietet, das Personal war allerdings sehr bemüht, sodass wir trotzdem innerhalb von 10 Minuten einen Roller erhalten haben). Zudem kann man über die Unterkunft Touren und Busse für die Weiterfahrt buchen. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und die Nacht sehr gut geschlafen. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen - sehr empfehlenswert.

review.rating: Best pool views in Phong Nha
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Lucky Homes was a great place to stay. The rooms were spacious (bathrooms were huge!) and had everything in them you'd need. The mountain views from the pool are fabulous - the pool a great way to cool down after a busy day. Lucky Homes has bikes available for use by their guests, which is great to go out and explore. About a 10 minutes walk from the town, it is easily walkable, but the bikes just made things a little bit easier. 
Meal options (we had breakfast and dinner several times) are great - the pepper pork is definitely worth a try! You can chose to have your meals in the restaurant or across the road overlooking the mountains and the river. Lucky Homes is run by a lovely family who are always willing to help with any questions, we'd definitely stay here again!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.comment_negative: Nur eine Mitarbeiterin sprach etwas gebrochen englisch, mit den anderen war es praktisch unmöglich sich zu unterhalten, was die Organisation sehr schwierig machte. Kreditkartengebühren werden auf den Gast umgelegt.

review.comment_positive: Wir waren für eine Nacht hier und sind mit dem 4:30 Uhr Bus angekommen. Es gibt einen Fahrservice, so dass man abgeholt werden kann. Unser Zimmer war um die Uhrzeit noch belegt, aber wir konnten auf einem vorbereiteten Bett am Pool aus 2 Liegen schlafen. Kissen und Decke haben wir erhalten. Die Anlage ist sehr gepflegt und sehr schön. Das Zimmer ist groß und sehr sauber, das Bad ebenso. Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich. Wir konnten einen Roller mieten, uns über die Gegend informieren und ggf. Touren buchen. Auch den Bus zur Weiterreise haben wir hier gebucht. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und die Nacht sehr gut geschlafen. Können wir absolut empfehlen!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The rooms were spotless and comfortable. The food was delicious. We got a taxi from Dong Hoi and booked a bus to Hanoi through them which took a lot of the fuss out of travel and was cheaper than other Homestays charge. We also booked a taxi to the Botanical Gardens which waited for us whilst we hiked around and took us back with complimentary water. There were also some resident dogs which were very cute.

One of the best value vs. price stays you'll find out there.

review.rating: Idealer Ort für ein paar Tage Aufenthalt mit Kindern
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Äußerst familienfreundliches, sehr sauberes, gemütliches Homestay am Ortsrand (ca 1km Fußmarsch zur Bootsanlegestelle), dafür ruhig gelegen, mit schönem großen Pool im Innenhof...unsere Kinder haben ihn geliebt. Frühstück a la carte, Mittag und Abendessen, ganztägig Getränke im kleinen zugehörigen familiengeführten Restaurant möglich. Man kann alle in der Umgebung geführten Touren buchen, ohne sie aufgedrängt zu bekommen, kann kostenlos Fahrräder nutzen und auch ansonsten werden alle Organisationen von Binh und Xiem übernommen ...Pick up am Nachtzug in Dong Hoi, Busticket für die Weiterfahrt usw. 
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Vielen lieben Dank an Xiem und Binh!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
C’est simple, tout était incroyable. On s’y sens comme chez sois, les propriétaires sont adorables ! Ils sont au petit soin pour que vous passiez le meilleur séjour possible. 
Niveau propreté, c’est impeccable. Nous avons passé 3 nuits là bas, les chambres sont nettoyées tous les jours, les serviettes sont changées également tous les jours.
Ils peuvent organiser vos sorties, excursions. Personnellement nous avons fait l’excursion Ruc Mon cave, c’était pour nous, notre meilleur expérience au Vietnam (après 1 mois ici).
Je tiens à remettre l’accent sur l’accueille et l’attention apporté par les propriétaires. 
Je vous recommande fortement cet Homestay, vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés !

review.rating: Joile piscine et belles tables au bord du fleuve.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Jolie vue depuis les tables du restaurant au bord de rivière Son. La piscine est superbe. La salle de bain est aussi grande qu’un studio Parisien.
La chambre est grande et la literie confortable, malheureusement la vue des numéros 2,3 et 4 donne directement sur la réception. Ils pourraient installer un brise vue telle qu’une verrière. Pour nous ce n’est pas gênant car on ne passe pas beaucoup de temps dans la chambre au final.
review.comment_negative: Il vendent des excursions qui ont l’air bien cependant ils sont très insistants sur ces tours de 1 jour. Si vous n’aimez pas les horaires et aimez changer de plan en cas de mauvais temps, voici ce qu’ils ne nous ont pas dit mais qui pourrait vous être utile: l’embarcadère pour visiter les caves de Phong Nha (prix 150K + bateau 550K pour 12 personnes max) est à 8 minutes à pied. Devant celui-ci vous trouverez facilement un taxi ( prix/ journée 700K). Le guide du routard dit que on peut aller à vélo à Dark cave (prix 450K) 30 minutes selon mes estimations en plus c’est super amusant car vous devez traverser la rivière sur une petite barque. Ma femme et mes 2 filles de 10 et 12 ne sont pas très aventurières donc je n’ai pas pu tester à regret. Pour Paradis cave (prix 250K) vous devez louer une voiture je vous conseille d’y aller le matin et finir la journée à Suôi Nouc Mook ( prix 180K).

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour !

Chambre spacieuse, propre et confortable.

Très bon petit déjeuner.

Accueil au top !
review.comment_negative:
Nous avons eu beaucoup de problème avec les scooters de cet hôtel.

On a l'habitude de conduire des scooter en Asie, mais on avait jamais eu autant de problèmes..

Jour 1 : on a un premier scooter, on conduit 3 km, et il s'éteint alors qu'on conduisait, on est au milieu de rien, on appelle l'auberge, on vient nous aider, ils arrivent à le redémarrer
On demande à changer de scooter parce qu'on veut partir loin et on veut éviter de se retrouver en panne en étant loin de l'auberge 
Finalement le temps que le scooter soit changé et qu'on visite une grotte en attendant en se déplaçant à pied, la journée est terminé

Jour 2 : on a un nouveau scooter, celui-ci est pire, il s'arrête toutes les 5 min, mais on décide de faire avec, pas le choix, on n'a pas le temps, c'est notre dernier jour dans la ville et on a beaucoup a visiter
La journée passe, il s'arrête souvent et on met à chaque  fois 5 min à le redémarrer, on visite la paradise cave et la dark cave
Il nous reste une grotte a visiter en fin de journée, et la impossible de s'y rendre, le scooter ne démarre plus
On ne capte pas internet, on doit marcher 2 km pour pouvoir appeler l'auberge, on attend 1h, ça nous caché notre fin de journée, on a dû conduire sous la pluie à la nuit tombée pour rentrer.

Vraiment merci beaucoup aux deux personnes qui nous sont venus en aide, on aurait jamais réussi à revenir sinon !

Mais svp arrêter de louer des scooters comme ça, ça nous a caché notre passage à Phong Nha et on n'aura probablement pas l'occasion de revenir de si tôt.

review.rating: Heerlijk verblijf direct aan de rivier!

review.comment_positive: Fijne accommodatie om als uitvalsbasis te gebruiken voor de vele excursies die hier in de omgeving te doen zijn. Wij vonden de locatie perfect. Direct aan de rivier, relatief rustig gelegen, maar met vele restaurants in de omgeving. Kamer was ruim, met een grote badkamer en douche. Ideaal voor ons als gezin! Fijn zwembad om bij te komen na een drukke dag. Geweldig uitzicht op de prachtige natuur!
review.comment_negative: Accommodatie is helemaal top. Echter goed om te weten dat ze geen kinderbedjes hebben. Voor ons geen probleem, we hebben het matras op de grond gelegd. Ook het ontbijt is logischerwijs beperkt in keuze, wat lastig kan zijn met kleine kinderen. Wij hebben echter 50m verderop ook een paar keer ontbeten en avond gegeten, vanwege de Westerse menukaart. Dus geen reden om deze home stay niet te boeken :-)

review.comment_positive: the hotel was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. the bathroom was nice and very large. the pool is very pretty and there’s a restaurant at the property which makes breakfast very convenient. the staff is so helpful and attentive, they treated us like we were family. they also have bikes you can use and gave us water in our room. we were also able to book tours with them which was very convenient and the tours were great. the hotel also offers great views and is right on the river. we had an amazing stay.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: The best thing about Lucky Homes was the staff, they were both accommodating and friendly. The chef invited me one night to hang out and chill with him and have some beer, snacks, and rice wine, was an awesome time. The second thing I loved about Lucky Homes was how delicious the food was, I did not have to eat out at any other restaurants cause the food here was really good, and I never ate the same thing twice, the chef had a good variety of meals to suggest for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. The property itself was very clean, and the room and bathroom were massive, with more than enough space, which made it super comfortable. The location was right across from the river, they have tables and chairs for you to relax and have a drink or eat while enjoying the beautiful scenery. It's not too far from the town center, maybe like a 25-minute walk, but I enjoyed the area around Lucky Homes more. They have bicycles free to use, which was fun exploring the neighborhood, and also motorbike rental, which I used to drive to Paradise Cave, highly recommended. Overall, this was one of the best trips I have taken in a while and Lucky Homes attributed a large amount of the reason why I had such a great time.
review.comment_negative: The only thing I didn't like was that there was no T.V in the room, but was not that big of a deal.

review.comment_positive: Merci beaucoup aux gérant de cet Homestay qui ont permis de rendre notre séjour très agréable. Nous avons été contacté en amont afin de sélectionner une excursion en avance, ce qui nous a permis de gagner du temps sur place. De plus, nous voyagions en bus de nuit, les gérants sont venus nous récupérer à 2h du matin et nous ont déposé à 3h à la station de bus, et ce totalement gratuitement et par gentillesse ! Nous avons rarement été aussi bien accueillis. Donc encore une fois, merci beaucoup ! Concernant le logement, il est spacieux, la literie est confortable et la salle de bain est assez grande. Nous n’avons absolument rien à reprocher à ce logement, le rapport qualité prix est vraiment impressionnant. D’autant plus la gentillesse de nos hôtes.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Everything went well. There was a restaurant on premises with delicious food. They also had available bicycles at no extra charge. You could also rent a motorbike and they provided good helmet. The staff were able to provide contact with good tour operators and were helpful to set up the program of visits to caves, etc, in the region. the breakfast was included and was delicious. Great tables by the river as well as on their patio. Good pool - which is not common in this small town - so it was very much appreciated. Beds big and very comfortable. Very clean all round and a pleasant atmosphere. I will return again!
